title: Please help me, do you know this Mortadella?
content:
This is the title of a book made by Cornel Windlin

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mortadella,.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522153346/http:/typophile.com/files/mortadella,.jpg) | 112.08 KB |
author: Tobias75

comments.content: Looks like a poorly digitized Bookman.

Why poorly digitized? I like it!  
It has more character, especially the a is cool (although a weird mix of styles).
Ew, I think that a is horrible.
If it’s by Windlin it’s likely something of his own creation.
